name: binance-isolated-margin-order-notification
description: Binance does not currently offer notifications when orders are created, cancelled or fulfilled etc.. With this repo you will receive telegram notifications for your binance isolated margin order status.

TELEGRAM_TOKEN.description: Telegram Key for your bot (To create one follow https://core.telegram.org/bots#6-botfather )

TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID.description: Unique identifier for the target chat, Your Telegram Chat ID
